content:
Please could github README.md landing page here : https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime

Link to build intro here : https://docs.wasmtime.dev/contributing-building.html

First thing a newbie will want to do from source is build.

GitHub - bytecodealliance/wasmtime: Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift
Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift - GitHub - bytecodealliance/wasmtime: Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift

There is a link via contributing, but that's backwards. Contributing comes after comprehending. From user's perspective, they will want to build & will be looking for a how to build link. I had to go back to google to find it.

Hence proposing a link is added to the top menu

Build -> https://docs.wasmtime.dev/contributing-building.html
